title: Why You Need a Budget with Jesse Mecham
itunes:title: Why You Need a Budget with Jesse Mecham
description:
Budgeting. We’re never gonna stop talking about it. AND on this episode we have THE Jesse Mecham, creator and founder of the famous budgeting app ‘You Need a Budget’. For those still wondering whether or not they actually need a budget, and for all the rest who benefit from more reminders and tips; listen in!

🎙️ Get full show notes here!
https://bit.ly/3CsWB6W

📑 Get our FREE Modern Frugal Living eBook here!
https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/ebook

📣 Submit your bill of the week and get a shoutout from us
https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/bill-of-the-week/

💸 Check out our monthly challenge community
http://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club

👉🏼 Subscribe for more on YouTube
https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends

💃🏼 Hang out with us on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
